{"item":"Hand Hygiene","QuestionsText":"Hands have been washed","OptionA":"","OptionB":"","OptionC":"","OptionD":"","QuestText":"Next, Don The:","CurrentObject":"N95 Respirator","CurrentNumber":""}

{"item":"N95 Mask","QuestionsText":"What area of the face should be covered by the N95 Mask?","OptionA":"Mouth and Nose","OptionB":"Mouth","OptionC":"Nose","OptionD":"Eyes and Nose","QuestText":"Select the correct answer","CurrentObject":"","CurrentNumber":"1"}

{"item":"N95 Mask","QuestionsText":"What is the first step in donning the N95 Respirator?","OptionA":"Place the N95 against your face by cupping the N95 in ONE hand and then placing it over your nose and mouth","OptionB":"Place the N95 against your face by cupping the N95 in BOTH hands and then placing it over your nose and mouth","OptionC":"Invert the mask","OptionD":"Bend the cusp over your nose","QuestText":"Select the correct answer","CurrentObject":"","CurrentNumber":"2"}

{"item":"N95 Mask","QuestionsText":"What is the next step in donning the N95 Respirator?","OptionA":"Secure the ear loops or ties/elastic bands at middle of head and neck","OptionB":"While holding the N95 against your face, the other hand stretches the elastic bands under the chin","OptionC":"While holding the N95 against your face, the other hand stretches the elastic bands over the head and neck","OptionD":"Secure the ear loops or ties/elastic bands at middle of head","QuestText":"Select the correct answer","CurrentObject":"","CurrentNumber":"3"}

{"item":"N95 Mask","QuestionsText":"What should you do after the bands are fit?","OptionA":"You ensure the N95 fits snuggly and confirm you cannot feel air escaping from the bottom (chin)","OptionB":"You ensure the N95 fits snuggly and confirm you cannot feel air escaping from the top (nose)","OptionC":"You ensure the N95 fits snuggly and confirm you cannot feel air escaping from cheek to cheek","OptionD":"You ensure the N95 fits snuggly and confirm you cannot feel air escaping from the top (nose) and bottom (chin)","QuestText":"Select the correct answer","CurrentObject":"","CurrentNumber":"4"}
{"item":"N95 Mask","QuestionsText":"N95 Respirator has been donned","OptionA":"","OptionB":"","OptionC":"","OptionD":"","QuestText":"Next, Don The:","CurrentObject":"Head Cover","CurrentNumber":""}

{"item":"Gown","QuestionsText":"What areas of the body should be covered by the gown?","OptionA":"Fully cover torso from neck to knees","OptionB":"Fully cover torso from neck to thighs","OptionC":"Fully cover torso from neck to waist","OptionD":"Fully cover torso from neck to ankles","QuestText":"Select the correct answer","CurrentObject":"","CurrentNumber":"1"}

{"item":"Gloves","QuestionsText":"How many pairs of gloves should be applied?","OptionA":"1","OptionB":"2","OptionC":"3","OptionD":"4","QuestText":"Select the correct answer","CurrentObject":"","CurrentNumber":"1"}

{"item":"Gloves","QuestionsText":"How far should the gloves extend?","OptionA":"Extend to forearm","OptionB":"Extend until comfortable","OptionC":"Extend gloves over the isolation gown and ensure wrists are covered","OptionD":"None of the above","QuestText":"Select the correct answer","CurrentObject":"","CurrentNumber":"2"}
